preference.name: AWC_visStdViewOrientationLeft
preference.preference_description: Specifies the camera orientation for the Left view for the Viewer in the Active Workspace client. Right's camera orientation value will be set opposite of Left. Valid values are: * +x : Sets the Left view orientation to +x. This is the default value. * +y : Sets the Left view orientation to +y * +z : Sets the Left view orientation to +z * -x : Sets the Left view orientation to -x * -y : Sets the Left view orientation to -y * -z : Sets the Left view orientation to -z
